interface.name: ThreadStartRequest
interface.javadoc:
Request for notification when a thread starts execution in the target VM. When an enabled ThreadStartRequest is hit, an{@link com.sun.jdi.event.EventSet event set} containing a{@link com.sun.jdi.event.ThreadStartEvent ThreadStartEvent}will be placed on the{@link com.sun.jdi.event.EventQueue EventQueue}. The collection of existing ThreadStartRequests is managed by the {@link EventRequestManager}
